text: Ian Gibson (26 September 1938 – 9 April 2021) was a British Labour Party politician. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Norwich North from 1997 to 2009. He resigned from the House of Commons on 5 June 2009. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from Dumfries and Galloway
title: Ian Gibson (politician)
